clue1.content: Ben, Amy, Carl and Donna all want to meet up for lunch one day in the holidays, but they have not been able to all meet on the same day.

clue2.content: Amy is free to meet on Mondays, Wednesdays and Thursdays.

clue3.content: Carl has to go to work on Mondays and Thursdays.

clue4.content: Ben canâ€™t make Tuesdays, Wednesdays or Saturdays.

clue5.content: Donna can be available on Mondays, Tuesdays and Fridays.

clue6.content: They all want to spend time at home on Sundays.
